com.erudika.para.search

Class LuceneSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erudika.para.search.LuceneSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Search

    @Singleton
public class LuceneSearch
extends Object
implements Search
    An implementation of the Search interface using Lucene core.
    Author:
    Alex Bogdanovski [alex@erudika.com]
